item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:43, topic:255626”][quote author=maniown link=topic=337762.msg2649343#msg2649343 date=1233447142]

I thought quite well of the whole thing until he got to this part…

Man, one of the first things Obama did in his speech was thank president Bush for his service to the country. That’s right, service; I guess in Obama-code service means ass-rape, which is really fucking scary considering how much this guy has talked about “Serving” our country. I mean, what the fuck? He’s a pragmatic centrist, which is code for greedy corporate whore, man. You must have missed that meeting.

i wouldnt mind… servicing… his daughter

Shes like 6… lol
[/quote]
im betting theres grass on the field, if so, then its time to play ball

i thought she was alot older than that though :S[/quote]

Lmfao wow. Vid it!

Read full topic

item.title: Obama
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Obama seems like a cool guy, he really does. I reckon he’ll be a good president, but even if he’s not he deserves a chance to have a go. But, everyone needs to stop referring to him as the “black” president, he just needs to be known as the president of the United States.

I agree, there’s no need to differentiate him so much.

Read full topic
